name: Sheraton Grand Salzburg
description: Book your stay at Austria's famous Mozart city & benefit from flexible and free cancellation policies at the Sheraton Grand Salzburg. Our 5 star hotel is adjacent to the world-famous Mirabell Gardens, the Mirabell Palace and Salzburg Congress Center. Overlooking the city or the garden, you can relax in the cozy atmosphere of our 168 spacious rooms and suites. A true highlight is our top floor ETAGE7 - an exclusive space high above the rooftops of Salzburg with breathtaking mountain scenery and a view to the Fortress Hohensalzburg. The Sheraton Club Lounge, newly designed for Marriott Bonvoy Members, is a place for working, relaxing and meeting friends. Enjoy Austrian cuisine in the modernized Restaurant Mirabell, or Italian classic at The taste.it restaurant. Live piano music and refreshing cocktails can be enjoyed at the Piano Bar, a gathering place in the heart of the lobby. Host your next meeting or event at our business hotel and let our team help you plan your successful event.Marriott

name: Boutiquehotel Amadeus
description: Junior Suite: Discover the attention to detail - Our spacious junior suites offer a view of the historic Linzergasse or St. Sebastian cemetery. The spacious layout of these rooms allows you to enjoy the perfect comfort for longer stays in Salzburg. All rooms have free WiFi, flat-screen TV with infotainment system including radio and sound of music film, some with marble bathrooms, room safe and direct dial telephone. Due to the historical structure of the hotel, the rooms can vary in their equipment, design and size. Quiet, central location in Salzburg's old town in the pedestrian zone. Within walking distance of most of the sights, the festival halls and the Salzburg congress center. Hotel access by car is possible at any time, cheap parking garage around the corner. Cozy rooms with telephone, cable TV and bathroom with shower or bath / toilet and hairdryer. 24 h / free internet access in the lobby. Costs on the spot: Price includes: overnight stay, safe, TV, afternoon coffee Not included: parking lot agreement with Linzer Gasse and motorcycle parking spaces Dogs are welcome: 24 € / animal / nightVRBO

name: Wyndham Grand Salzburg Conference Centre
address: Fanny Von Lehnert Strasse 7, 5026 Salzburg, Salzburg
description: A 20-minute walk from Salzburg's Old Town and only 300 metres from the Main Train Station, the Wyndham Grand Salzburg Conference Centre has a fitness centre, a sauna, and an indoor pool. Free WiFi is available. The Wyndham’s modern rooms offer air conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, a seating area and a bathroom with bathtub, toiletries, and hairdryer. Austrian and international dishes, as well as a wide range of exclusive drinks and cocktails, are served at the BarRoque. The Mirabell Gardens are a 10-minute walk away from the Wyndham Hotel & Conference Centre.

name: Mayburg Salzburg, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel
description: The boundaries between work and leisure, travel and home are becoming increasingly fluid. Whatever the context, we need an environment that supports us and provides us with fresh inspiration. With its 8 Junior Suites, 29 Deluxe King rooms and 51 Superior King rooms, the Hotel Mayburg is a retreat to switch off from everyday life and recharge your batteries. There is plenty of space in this nurturing location to connect with yourself or casually enjoy being in community. The Living Room restaurant lives up to its name, setting the table for dialogue in the foyer of the Mayburg where not just the interactions are nourishing. The menu offers energising, healthy dishes made from local ingredients served up creatively and full of flavour. Here, guests and locals come together to enjoy a place whose beauty is the sum of its countless details, true to the philosophy of Josef Mayburger – the muse of this oasis.Marriott

name: Mercure Salzburg City
description: Quietly located in the heart of Mozart city, the 4-star Mercure Salzburg City hotel welcomes you, whether you are exploring Salzburg historic Old Town, or visiting the Festival or the Exhibition Center. The hotel is easily accessible by public transport or car, and has a seminar area, outdoor parking, and parking garage. The Le Sel restaurant serves local and international specialties.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Sallerhof
description: Located in Grödig at the foot of Untersberg Mountain, the Sallerhof is just 6 km from Salzburg’s city centre. It offers free wired internet and a furnished balcony in every room. The modern rooms are very spacious and feature wooden floors, a flat-screen cable TV, and a bathroom with hairdryer. Each room offers views of the garden or Untersberg Mountain. A large breakfast buffet with local products and homemade specialities is served every morning. Many restaurants are close by. Free private parking is provided directly at the Hotel Garni Sallerhof. Guests can rent bicycles and book tickets and excursions at the reception. The Sound of Music tour picks up guests at the front door. A bus stop providing direct connections to Salzburg Main Train Station is just 250 metres away. The trip takes about 35 minutes. The Grödig exit of the A10 motorway is less than one km away.

name: Hotel Walserwirt
description: Family-run since 1607, Hotel Walserwirt enjoys a quiet location in the centre of Wals, 3 km from Salzburg Airport and a 15-minute drive from the centre of Salzburg. Steak and beef specialities can be enjoyed in the restaurant Paul’s Steak Stubn. Schloss Kleßheim is reachable within 5 km. The free spa area offers a sauna, steam bath, Finnish sauna, bio sauna and a heated indoor swimming pool. 5 seminar rooms are available. Parking is available free of charge, and free WiFi access is offered in public areas. Guests can rent e-bikes at Hotel Walserwirt to explore the surroundings. The A1 motorway is just a 3-minute drive away, and the Messe Salzburg exhibition centre can be reached in an 8-minute drive.

name: Austria Classic Hotel Hölle
address: Doktor Adolf Altmann Strasse 2, 5020 Salzburg, Salzburg
description: Comfort double room: The pleasant standard rooms with shower or Bathroom and toilet are equipped with satellite TV with Sky, internet access, hairdryer, safe, radio and a minibar. Sauna, bicycles can be used free of charge by our guests. Our video-monitored parking lot is also available free of charge. Small family hotel on the outskirts of Salzburg, just a few minutes from the old town, with the most modern 4-star comfort. The house is completely renovated, fully air-conditioned, offers Internet and email in every room. There is also a very well-known restaurant and the in-house sauna. Own smoking area. Costs on the spot: Services included in the room price: sauna, herbal steam, Finnish sauna, WLAN 35 free parking spaces; Underground parking: € 4.00 12 motorcycle parking spaces for a fee; Garage Services to be paid: pet in the room € 6.00, breakfast buffet € 15.00VRBO

name: Schloss Mönchstein Hotel
description: Romantic 5-star superior hotel in Salzburg High above the roofs of Salzburg luxurious residing, delicious dining, celebrating and relaxing take centre stage. The 5-star-superior Hotel Schloss Monchstein in the heart of Salzburg offers its guests genuine exclusiveness: luxuriously furnished rooms and suites with elegant interior, gourmet-restaurant THE GLASS GARDEN, Monchstein SPA for pure wellness delight and breathtaking view to the city of Mozart.iHotelier/iStay

name: Amadeo Hotel Schaffenrath
description: Single room with shower or Bath / WC: Whether you are traveling in a group or on business in Salzburg - you can enjoy first-class comfort at the Amadeo Hotel Schaffenrath. All rooms are furnished according to the philosophy of business feng shui - one more reason why you feel particularly comfortable in the Amadeo Hotel Schaffenrath. Your single room in a prime location We offer you plenty of space. Even in our bright and friendly single rooms. You have the choice between rooms with a balcony or terrace, separate living rooms and bedrooms, barrier-free rooms and much more. A hotel for all holiday wishes: The Hotel Schaffenrath in the south of the city of Salzburg inspires with its versatility. The hotel's 48 rooms and 28 apartments are dominated by a friendly atmosphere - enjoy spaciousness and modern architecture. Known for its quality, the hotel offers a temporary home for travelers with a wide range of interests. Families and individual guests feel in good hands in the cozy atmosphere of the hotel rooms, the apartments and the restaurant. The Hotel Schaffenrath is also your perfect seminar hotel: 8 bright conference rooms in different sizes are available. In addition to the modern seminar rooms, you will particularly appreciate the spacious architecture of the hotel. Atrium, terraces, foyers, lobbies, extensive break rooms, creative space, library and much more - the seminar hotel Schaffenrath impresses with space and openness. The eight modern seminar rooms offer space for up to 220 people - there are no spatial limits to your ideas for conferences and congresses. A variety of possible combinations and seating arrangements make the seminar rooms changeable and versatile. You will also be impressed by the perfect location of the seminar hotel in Salzburg: quick and easy to reach and with perfect infrastructure - from free garage spaces to bus parking spaces, everything is available. Own smoking area. Costs on site: Pet for a fee (without food) Parking (underground garage) for cars and garage for motorbikes free Breakfast buffet per person / day EUR 15.00 Non smoking accommodationVRBO

name: Hotel Goldener Hirsch, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Salzburg
description: The Hotel Goldener Hirsch, A Luxury Boutique Hotel in Salzburg, epitomizes exceptional hospitality and celebrated tradition. Dating back to 1407, it embodies an enduring symbiosis between original country house and luxury boutique hotel, woven into the very fabric of Salzburg life. Located just steps away from Mozart’s birthplace, in the heart of the city’s evocative old town, Hotel Goldener Hirsch inhabits Salzburg’s fairy tale setting with natural grace. Defined by its hunting lodge heritage, trophies and mounted antlers populate the walls, whilst the crest of a leaping deer is a recurring presence. Smartly-dressed associates, wearing uniforms reminiscent of national Tracht, welcome guests with a rare warmth that resonates across generations.Worried about leaving your furry friends behind? Bring them along! Our hotel is pet friendly and welcomes trained pets.Marriott

name: Hotel Sacher Salzburg
description: Opened in 1866, the privately owned Hotel Sacher Salzburg is a grand, historic hotel which combines timeless elegance and tradition with highest standard of service. It is centrally located on the banks of the Salzach River with magnificent and unique views of the historic old town and Hohensalzburg Fortress. Free Wi-Fi is available in the entire hotel. All rooms and suites are furnished in an individual fashion and offer state-of-the-art facilities. Each one has been personally decorated by Mrs. Elisabeth Gürtler, the hotel's owner, with a great love of details. Furnishings include original paintings and silk wallpapers. All rooms offer air conditioning, a minibar, and bathrobes. The restaurant Zirbelzimmer, whose wooden panelling and elaborately carved ceilings are unique in Salzburg, is a popular meeting place for gourmets. Restaurant Roter Salon is located on the footpath along the Salzach River and offers beautiful views of the old town and restaurant Salzachgrill serves barbecue specialties. The famous Café Sacher Salzburg serves the original Sacher cake in a typical Austrian coffee house ambience with an elegant touch. Sacher Bar serves a wide range of drinks accompanied by live piano music.
